title: @Riot please I just need to hear it from you...
body:
{{champion:72}} 

Role Diversity 

Is it going to happen?

I just need to know.  I miss my top lane scorpion. 

Please fulfill my dreams  (say yes) or put me out of my misery (spires gonna stay). 

"If your feelings are the same as they were last April, tell me so at once. My affections and wishes have not changed (revert skarner), but one word from you will silence me forever."

Bonus points if you know the quote without google.

replies.body:
price and prejudice chapter 58.

not everyone is stuck in their house :)
So are you saying you can only read a book outside?
